Sentence.value: Infections like tetanus and gangrene are caused by anaerobic bacteria.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Infections like [[tetanus|C0039614]] and [[gangrene|C0017086]] are caused by [[anaerobic bacteria|C0004613]].

Sentence.value: Anaerobic infections typically cause abscesses (buildups of pus), and death of tissue.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Anaerobic [[infections|C0021311]] typically cause [[abscesses|C0000833]] (buildups of pus), and death of tissue.

Sentence.value: In exercise, our bodies need to perform both anaerobic and aerobic reactions to supply us with energy.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: In exercise, our bodies need to perform both anaerobic and [[aerobic reactions|C0678618]] to supply us with [[energy|C0542479]].

Sentence.value: Anaerobic exercise leads to a buildup of lactic acid in our tissues.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Anaerobic exercise leads to a buildup of [[lactic acid|C0064582]] in our [[tissues|C0040300]].
